welcome_message_body: Welcome to Manrar, India! Known for its rich cultural heritage and vibrant atmosphere, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and have a wonderful time!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Muzaffarpur Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for 2 hours with a valid phone number.
